title: Rethinking Big Ideas: The Path to a More Generous World
description: Kickstarter co-founder Yancey Strickler has never felt comfortable with an economic system that values short-term profits over long-term human needs. In a quarantine conversation with host Rufus Griscom, he shares his ideas for moving from a me/now world to one that cares about us and the future.
itunes:title: Rethinking Big Ideas: The Path to a More Generous World
itunes:author: Next Big Idea Club
